3391.name: Mortality from CVD, cancer, diabetes or CRD between exact ages 30 and 70 (%)
3391.description: Mortality from CVD, cancer, diabetes or CRD is the percent of 30-year-old-people who would die before their 70th birthday from any of cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes,  or chronic respiratory disease, assuming that s/he would experience current mortality rates at every age and s/he would not die from any other cause of death (e.g., injuries or HIV/AIDS).
3391.s_name: World Bank – WDI: Mortality from CVD, cancer, diabetes or CRD between exact ages 30 and 70 (%)

source.name: World Bank – WDI: Mortality from CVD, cancer, diabetes or CRD between exact ages 30 and 70 (%)
source.dataPublisherSource: World Health Organization, Global Health Observatory Data Repository (http://apps.who.int/ghodata/).
